article_metadata.description: Abbvie chief executive Rick Gonzalez, whose team beat out several more established drug giants in the successful bid for cancer pill maker Pharmacyclics, said today new and existing products will bring “top tier growth through the rest of the decade and beyond.” Gonzalez’ bold statement, setting the stage for a larger [...]
